arm_group.description: stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm

brief_summary.textblock:
Prospective registry study to evaluate safety and efficacy of stent assisted embolization of
      intracranial aneurysm.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of StENt-assisted Treatment for CErebral Aneurysms

detailed_description.textblock:
To evaluate stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm, record information about
      treatment and any event (death, stroke, hemorrhagic event) prospectively.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm

          -  20 or more year old

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  not determined

study_pop.textblock: stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm

intervention.description: stent assisted embolization and anti-thrombotic management

facility.name: Kobe City Medical Center General Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of StENt-assisted Treatment for CErebral Aneurysms

overall_official.affiliation: Kobe City Medical Center General Hospital

primary_outcome.description: any death, stroke and major hemorrhagic event within 2 years after treatment
primary_outcome.measure: any death, stroke and major hemorrhagic event

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description:
death, stroke, hemorrhagic event within 30days or between 31days to 2years after treatment
any change of anti-thrombotic therapy within 2years after treatment
recanalization or re-treatment within 2years after treatment
stent stenosis or occlusion within 2years after treatment
any adverse event within 2years after treatment

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
